title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content: 1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tag, 2) HTML fragments not within <html> tag, and 3) Text with RTF tags, the dynamic text element does not display the content correctly.
SR: To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 1. Create a database field with the three types of content mentioned above. 2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of the field. Observe that the dynamic text element does not display the content correctly.
